transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello? Hello? Haan? Hello? Ji good morning sir, Smriti baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Boliye.
Executive: Sir aapki basically kuch call aayi thi sir jaan sakte hai kya reason hai?
Customer: Haan call toh aaya tha actually kya hai na IndiaMART mein jab ek trial inquiry karwaya tha waha pe kya dekha hu inquiry kisi aur ke paas chala ja raha hai aur call kisi aur ke paas se aa raha hai aur ek baar call me karke matlab call supplier karke jo option hai na toh waha pe bhi call kiya tha kisi aur ke paas call chala gaya tha toh yeh kaise matlab aisa kaise ho raha hai aisa kyun ho raha hai?
Executive: Like jo aapko calls ek baar dobara se samjhayenge aapki na voice thodi kat kat ke aa rahi hai like aapke paas jo calls aa rahi hai supplier ki kya bol rahe sir aap? Hello? Buyer se call aa rahi hai sir aapke paas?
Customer: Haan dekhiye ek trial ek trial inquiry kiya tha check karwane ke liye ki sab kuch sahi hai ki nahi.
Customer: Toh pehle toh jo inquiry kiya tha woh inquiry hamare paas aaya nahi.
Customer: Theek hai?
Customer: Aur ek call bhi kiya tha IndiaMART ka jo call option hai toh call bhi kiya tha toh call hamara isko ke paas aaya nahi kisi aur ke paas chala gaya hai.
Customer: Ek particular item ko leke woh kar raha tha toh aisa dekh raha tha toh hamare paas kyun call nahi aa raha hai kyun inquiry nahi aaya tha matlab kuch kuch toh lead toh aa raha hai woh alag cheez hai woh kaise aa raha hai kya mechanism mein aa raha hai I don't know but hum log jab inquiry kar raha hu matlab trial inquiry karwa raha hu kisi aur se aur ko deke toh aisa scenario dikhne ko mil raha hai.
Executive: Accha jo aapka concern yeh hai ki aapne jo trial inquiry karaya tha uske liye jo call karaya woh call aap pe land nahi ho raha hai kisi aur ke paas land ho raha hai right?
Customer: Ji ji ji ji.
Executive: Ek minute sir line pe bane rahiye ek minute.
(silence)
Executive: Hello? Ji boliye. Hello? Haan ji sir main sir aapki aapka concern jaise main samajh pa rahi hu matlab aapne basically jo apne aapne isko engineering pe hi aapne inquiry karwai thi right sir? Aur call aapke land nahi hui.
Customer: Nahi. Toh call kaha land hui sir bata sakte hai kuch?
Customer: Call kisi ke aur ke paas gaya tha toh pata nahi abhi naam toh yaad nahi hai but kisi aur ke paas gaya tha ek toh hai direct call kiya tha aur ek inquiry bhi drop kiya tha woh inquiry hamare paas aaya nahi us particular inquiry inquiry toh aa raha hai woh lead vagera toh mil raha hai but irrelevant bhi hai bahut jyada anyway woh alag subject hai usko leke haan theek hai main samajh gayi samajh gayi aap kya kehna chahte hai dekho sir aisa hota hai yeh sab tabhi hota hai jaise ki agar aapka jo number hai na jaise ki number aapke paas call land nahi chahenge toh phir woh number network area mein na ho pehla cheez dusra sir kya hota hai ki dusra yeh hota hai sir ki automatically jaise ki kabhi kabhi hota hai na ki hum jab IndiaMART mein hamare paas call aata hai toh automatically woh spam mein chala jaata hai theek hai spam calls mein agar aapne number nahi save kiya hua hai IndiaMART ka theek hai IndiaMART ka agar aapne number nahi save kiya hua hai IndiaMART buyer ka jo call aane wala toh ho sakta hai ki tab uske baad aapke paas call woh answer na ho woh basically like spam mein chala jaata hai yeh dikkat aa sakti hai sir.
Customer: Nahi aisa toh dekhiye call toh dekhiye teen alag alag number se connect kiya tha theek hai yaha pe aap dekh payenge detail mein toh ek phone mein bhi call aaya nahi matlab ek number mein bhi call aaya nahi.
Customer: Teen alag alag numbers add kiya hua hai toh ek mein toh aana toh chahiye na kisi na kisi toh uthata sir aur yeh working hour mein hi kiya tha inquiry karwaya tha.
Executive: Accha ek minute sir main check kar leti hu.
(silence)
Executive: Sir aapne jo calls hai yeh basically aapne yeh wala number save kiya hai sir 074942815193 jo aapka buyer trial number hai? Theek hai sir woh? Haan. Hmm. Number aapka theek hai. Check karke rakha tha. Ji check karke rakha tha.
Executive: Theek hai. Yaha pe aur aapne basically aapka jo number hai bata deti hu sir ki jo jo aapka jo PNS mein added hai woh 89 ek jo first number hai sir woh 89 se shuru hota hai last mein aapka 385 hai dusra number sir aapka 85 se shuru hota hai last mein 046 hai aur teesra number sir 89 se shuru hota hai last mein 382 hai.
Customer: 82 ji. Yeh teeno numbers aapke aap yeh teeno number se aapke matlab aapko call land nahi hua teeno mein se kisi pe bhi. Hum log hum teen log udhar hi baithe the theek hai toh call kisi aur se karwaya tha but ek ke paas bhi call aaya.
Executive: Ek baar bhi call nahi aaya?
Customer: Nahi ji.
Customer: Ek number mein bhi call aaya nahi.
Executive: Main dekh leti hu sir land landing hua aapka.
(silence)
Executive: Phone mein Truecaller installed hai aapka?
Customer: Haan Truecaller hai. Hello? Phone mein Truecaller hai. Truecaller hai. Truecaller hai toh sir aapne pehle usko uninstall kar do sir uski wajah se block hota hai.
Customer: Accha? Theek hai. Okay. Haan ji sir Truecaller ko na aap uninstall kar do kyunki isme main aapko bata rahi hu automatically spam mein chala jaata hai.
Customer: Accha.
Customer: Theek hai karta hu aisa toh Truecaller uninstall karne mein kam ho jayega aapko lag raha hai?
Executive: Sorry? Kya bol rahe hai? Truecaller uninstall karne mein kam ho jayega matlab call aane lagega?
Executive: Haan sir ek baar Truecaller install karke dekho kyunki woh bhi ek reason ho sakta hai ki aapka call na aa raha ho kyunki usme aisa hota hai usme automatically sir na aapka chala jaata hai spam mein.
Customer: Spam mein toh ja sakta hai but call kyun aa sakta hai na call toh aayega woh spam karke dikhayega woh alag cheez hai. Sir jaise ki sir jaise ki na block spam call ka option rehta hai sir theek hai agar woh aapka Truecaller mein woh activated hoga na toh aapke paas calls nahi aayengi.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Toh woh pehle kar lo sir uske baad phir hum uske baad phir aapko calls aane. Ek second ek second. Ek second. Are Rani phone phone Truecaller aache? Office phone time? Nei na. Office phone time aache? Okay. Accha isme se ek phone mein toh Truecaller toh hai nahi.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan ji sir. Hello? Haan bol raha hu yeh jo hamara teen numbers hai theek hai toh usme se ek phone mein Truecaller hai nahi toh waha pe toh waha pe toh call aa sakta tha na.
Executive: Okay matlab ek ek mein aapka Truecaller nahi hai dusre mein hai.
Customer: Haan woh 82 wala jo end mein hai 82 se jo end ho raha hai na toh waha pe Truecaller hai nahi waha pe toh aa sakta tha.
Executive: Ek minute sir call pe rahiye.
(silence)
Executive: Theek hai sir main na abhi na ek kaam karti hu main na aapka check karati hu apne level pe theek hai aapke paas call aayegi aap call answer karna IndiaMART ke aapke technical team se yaha se basically IndiaMART ki call aayegi.
Customer: Hmm. Aur aap hi hamara account manager hai na?
Executive: Haan ji main hi aapke account manager hu theek hai. Theek hai toh yeh number save karke rakho. kar rahi hu aapke liye. Haan haan sir aap number save karke rakho. Theek hai. Okay sir thank you. Okay okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Inquiries and calls are not landing on his number.

- Trial inquiries are going to someone else.

- Wants to know why calls are not being received.



Resolution:

- Executive checked the registered numbers.

- Suggested uninstalling Truecaller due to spam blocking.

- Assured the customer of a call from the technical team.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will check the issue at their level.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, truecaller, inquiry, calls
